channel.title: Smooth and Rough Carves :: CID guide website
channel.description: Once you have your file set up correctly, select both of your pieces and the rectangle around them and select the rough machining toolpath. Select your bit and make sure that `Machining Limit Boundary is set to “Selected Vectors.” Then Hit calculate. Your toolpath should look like a rough outline of your shape Now go back, select both pieces and the rectangle, and select Finish Machining Toolpath. Now for the bit selection, hit Select and then look for a bit that is the same size as the one you used for the first path, but says (Smooth Carve) on the end.
